00101 long EDLUTException::GetErrorValue(int a, int b, int c, int d){
00102         return ((((a)&(long)0xFF)<<24) | (((b)&0xFF)<<16) | (((c)&0xFF)<<8) | ((d)&0xFF));      
00103 }
00104 
00105 EDLUTException::EDLUTException(int a, int b, int c, int d){
00106         this->ErrorNum = GetErrorValue(a,b,c,d);
00107 }
00108 
00109 long EDLUTException::GetErrorNum() const{
00110         return this->ErrorNum;
00111 }
00112                 
00113 const char * EDLUTException::GetTaskMsg() const{
00114         return Taskmsgs[this->ErrorNum>>24];
00115 }
00116                 
00117 const char * EDLUTException::GetErrorMsg() const{
00118         return Errormsgs[(this->ErrorNum>>16) & 0xFF];
00119 }
00120                 
00121 const char * EDLUTException::GetRepairMsg() const{
00122         return Repairmsgs[(this->ErrorNum>>8) & 0xFF];
00123 }               
00124 
00125 void EDLUTException::display_error() const{
00126 
00127         char msgbuf[160];
00128         if(this->ErrorNum){
00129                 sprintf(msgbuf,"Error while: %s",this->GetTaskMsg());
00130                 fprintf(stderr,msgbuf);
00131                 //if((this->ErrorNum & 0xFF) == 1){
00132                         //sprintf(msgbuf,"In file line: %li",Currentline);
00133                         //fprintf(stderr,msgbuf);
00134                 //}
00135                 
00136                 sprintf(msgbuf,"Error message (%i): %s",this->ErrorNum,this->GetErrorMsg());
00137                 fprintf(stderr,msgbuf);
00138                 sprintf(msgbuf,"Try to: %s",this->GetRepairMsg());
00139                 fprintf(stderr,msgbuf);
00140         }
00141 }
00142 
00143 ostream & operator<< (ostream & out, EDLUTException Exception){
00144         if(Exception.GetErrorNum()){
00145                 out << "Error while: " << Exception.GetTaskMsg() << endl;
00146                 if((Exception.GetErrorNum() & 0xFF) == 1){
00147                         //sprintf(msgbuf,"In file line: %li",Currentline);
00148                         //fprintf(stderr,msgbuf);
00149                 }
00150                 
00151                 out << "Error message " << Exception.GetErrorNum() << ": " << Exception.GetErrorMsg() << endl;
00152                 out << "Try to: " << Exception.GetRepairMsg() << endl;
00153         }
00154         
00155         return out;
00156 }
